sections.ac: 22, touch 8, flat-footed 22 (+3 armor, -1 Dex, +11 natural, -1 size)
sections.special_attacks: mythic power (3/day, surge +1d6), powerful charge (flail, 4d6+10), superior two-weapon fighting
sections.treasure: standard (studded leather, 2 flails, 4 javelins, other treasure)
sections.languages: pidgin of Giant, Goblin, and Orc
sections.feats: CleaveM, Improved Initiative, Improved Overrun, Iron Will, Power AttackM

sections.name: Two Brains
sections.text: Anytime a mythic ettin attempts a Will saving throw, it rolls twice and uses the better result.

A mythic ettin is descended from a sordid lineage of mythic hill giants, mythic stone giants, and at least one mythic orc. Angrier, filthier, and stronger than other ettins, it is a leader of its kind, and is better at keeping a band or colony together for months or years.

sections.description: Flies buzz around this bestial, two-headed giant, and maggots squirm in the folds of its skin.
sections.name: Ettin, Mythic
sections.organization: solitary, pair, gang (3-6), troupe (1-2 plus 1-2 brown bears), band (3-6 plus 1-2 brown bears), or colony (3-6 plus 1-2 brown bears and 7-12 orcs or 9-16 goblins)

sections.text: Some mythic ettins are strongly related to one of their ancestral races, and have different mythic abilities.
sections.name: Variant Mythic Ettins

sections.text: A hill-giant-dominant mythic ettin loses its powerful charge and stench abilities but gains a mythic hill giant's earth bond and ground pound abilities.
sections.name: Hillblood Ettin (CR 8/MR 3)

sections.text: An orc-dominant mythic ettin loses its stench and two brains abilities, but gains blood rage and feral savagery.
sections.name: Orcblood Ettin (CR 8/MR 3)

sections.text: A stone giant-dominant mythic ettin loses its powerful charge and stench abilities, but gains a stone giant's improved rock catching and rock throwing.
sections.name: Stoneblood Ettin (CR 8/MR 3)
